properties.name: ActionOnFailure
properties.description: This specifies what action to take when the cluster step fails. Possible values are CANCEL_AND_WAIT and CONTINUE.

type.description: This specifies what action to take when the cluster step fails. Possible values are CANCEL_AND_WAIT and CONTINUE.

properties.name: HadoopJarStep
properties.description: The HadoopJarStepConfig property type specifies a job flow step consisting of a JAR file whose main function will be executed. The main function submits a job for the cluster to execute as a step on the master node, and then waits for the job to finish or fail before executing subsequent steps.

type.description: The HadoopJarStepConfig property type specifies a job flow step consisting of a JAR file whose main function will be executed. The main function submits a job for the cluster to execute as a step on the master node, and then waits for the job to finish or fail before executing subsequent steps.

properties.name: JobFlowId
properties.description: A string that uniquely identifies the cluster (job flow).

type.description: A string that uniquely identifies the cluster (job flow).

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the cluster step.

type.description: The name of the cluster step.
